## [Tidy Data Tutor](https://tidydatatutor.com/)

By [Sean Kross and Philip Guo](https://tidydatatutor.com/)

Added Fri Feb18, 2022**What is it?**

Tidy Data Tutor lets you write R and Tidyverse code in your browser and see how your data frame changes at each step of a data analysis pipeline.
(If you use Python, check out Pandas Tutor.)

1.  Link to R tutor: <https://tidydatatutor.com/>
2.  Link to Python tutor: <https://pandastutor.com/>
